code: import React from"react";import{setSortAscShow,setSortAscPop,setSortDescShow,setSortDescPop}from"../../../slices/TvShowSlice";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SortShows=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const handleSort=e=>{const selectedOption=e.target.value;switch(selectedOption){case"Title A to Z":dispatch(setSortAscShow());break;case"Title Z to A":dispatch(setSortDescShow());break;case"Popularity Ascending":dispatch(setSortAscPop());break;case"Popularity Descending":dispatch(setSortDescPop());break;default:break;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-yellow-500 p-2 rounded-xl flex flex-col gap-2 font-serif",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"font-bold text-2xl text-black",children:"Sort Results by"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{className:"text-black p-1 border rounded-xl bg-gray-300 text-lg w-full font-bold hover:bg-gray-500 cursor-pointer",onChange:handleSort,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Title A to Z"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Title Z to A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Popularity Ascending"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Popularity Descending"})]})]});};export default SortShows;
